item.description: Liked that link too. He has a sharp wit, sadly lacking in most web comics.

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.content:encoded:
Funny!

The same writer / artist, Rich Burlew, does ‘The Order of the Stick’ which is pretty darn funny too. Especially for roleplayers. It’s at:

http://www.giantitp.com/cgi-bin/GiantITP/ootscript
